name: Autumn Carrier
description:
Try to collect as much pumpkin beer as you can in this mini-game. 

You start with a mug of beer and a tray. With this you catch the falling pumpkin beer and fill a total of 4 mugs. The jugs and the tray must not fall down. If you've spilled too much, it's game over too. After every full pitcher there is a little opponent who makes the game a little more difficult (drunkenness, loss of gravity, etc.)

I wish you success!


Movement: Left = A; Right = D
Interaction: e

Also check out our bigger project 'Sinister Tale of Argo'. The public alpha demo came out on September 1st, 2021! https://rocrac.itch.io/sinister-tale-of-argo
